channel.title: CLI | KubeDB on Run production-grade databases easily on Kubernetes
channel.description: Recent content in CLI | KubeDB on Run production-grade databases easily on Kubernetes

item.title: CLI | KubeDB
item.description: New to KubeDB? Please start here. Manage KubeDB objects using CLIs KubeDB CLI KubeDB comes with its own cli. It is called kubedb cli. kubedb can be used to manage any KubeDB object. kubedb cli also performs various validations to improve ux. To install KubeDB cli on your workstation, follow the steps here. How to Create objects kubectl create creates a database CRD object in default namespace by default.
